alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 6:01PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR COASTAL DEL NORTE COUNTY... ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY HAS BEEN CANCELED FOR COASTAL HUMBOLDT AND MENDOCINO COUNTIES... ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY HAS BEEN CANCELED... * UPDATES...No further tsunami danger exists. However...some areas may continue to experience small water level changes along with currents that are stronger and more erratic than usual. AS LOCAL CONDITIONS CAN CAUSE A WIDE VARIATION IN TSUNAMI WAVE ACTION...THE ALL CLEAR DETERMINATIONS MUST BE MADE BY LOCAL AUTHORITIES. * OBSERVED TSUNAMI WAVE HEIGHTS FROM EARLIER... ARENA COVE... 3.7 FEET... HUMBOLDT BAY... 0.9 FEET. This will be the final statement issued for the local area for this event.

area.areaDesc: Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt
